author: Ben Davidson
description: Bright green and intensely flavoured but considering it is flavoured with absinthe and chartreuse, it is surprisingly subtle.
name: Elixir 66
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
15 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE coriander in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
